attributes.action: make cyclist use lights  when its dark
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am fed up when driving my car at night and finding so many cyclists   not using lights why is the police a not dealing with this, as it is a major problem on the roads. And to be honest it is not just kids, they’re plenty of adults who are also taking no notice of this law

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
